C

checkCollisions() - Method in class game.Game
This method checks if Player or Shooter objects touched any of Obstacle, Powerup or Bullet sprites.
checkTimer() - Method in class game.Game
This method checks if the levelTime is equal or less then 0, if it is the level ends and the user is moved to Congrats Screen
closeGame() - Method in class game.Game
This method nullifies all the objects required to run the game, it's used when going back to menu after playing the game.
closeMenu() - Method in class game.Game
This method nullifies all the object required for menu to function, it's used when starting the game from menu.
Coin - Class in assets
Class used to create coin sprite.
Coin(int, int) - Constructor for class assets.Coin
Constructor of Coin class
coins - Static variable in class game.Game
A variable used to store player's coins
color - Variable in class menus.Button
is the initiative color (before being selected)
color - Variable in class menus.LevelButton
is the initiative color (before being selected)
congrats(boolean) - Method in class assets.Sound
Plays or stops the congratulations sound based on given boolean
congratsScreen - Variable in class game.Game
An object created using CongratsScreen class
CongratsScreen - Class in menus
Class created to allow user to choose after finishing the level if he wants to continue or stop playing the game most parts are similar to the Menu class.
CongratsScreen() - Constructor for class menus.CongratsScreen
In constructor the class makes options array and initialize each member of array (which is a Button object) with it special value.
congratsSound - Variable in class assets.Sound
AudioClip parameter used to store audio file of congratulation sound and play it.
currentSelection - Variable in class menus.CongratsScreen
Variable for checking which button is user currently choosing
currentSelection - Variable in class menus.GameOverScreen
Variable for checking which button is user currently choosing
currentSelection - Variable in class menus.Levels
Variable for checking which button is user currently choosing
currentSelection - Variable in class menus.Menu
Which button the user is on now Numbers would be 0 for "PLAY",1 for "HOW TO PLAY", 2 for "OPTIONS", 3 for "SHOPS" and 4 for "EXIT"
currentSelection - Variable in class menus.Options
Variable for checking which button is user currently choosing
currentSelection - Variable in class menus.Pause
Variable for checking which button is user currently choosing
currentSelection - Variable in class menus.Shop
Which button the user is on now
currentSelection - Variable in class menus.Tutorial
Which button the user is on now
